title: Week 7 Recap: Chiefs Pull Away from the Niners, Seahawks Are Atop the NFC West, and the Bengals Offense is Back | The Ringer NFL Recap Show
description:
Nora and Steven are joined by Ben Solak to discuss the Chiefs' win over the Niners(2:35). Then, Nora and Steven pick their winners and losers for the week, including the Seahawks, Bengals, Colts, and more (25:33).

Hosts: Nora Princiotti and Steven Ruiz
Guest: Ben Solak
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
